TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProcessStartInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定启动进程时使用的一组值。

span.span: Specifies a set of values that are used when you start a process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用连同组件。 is used together with the component. 当启动进程使用类，您可以访问附加到正在运行的进程时处理之外，可用的信息。When you start a process using the class, you have access to process information in addition to that available when attaching to a running process. 可以使用类更好地控制启动的进程。You can use the class for better control over the process you start. 至少必须设置属性，而是手动或使用构造函数。You must at least set the property, either manually or using the constructor. 任何应用程序或文档的文件的名称。The file name is any application or document. 此处将文档定义已打开任何文件类型或默认与之关联的操作。Here a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 您可以查看已注册的文件类型和其关联的应用程序为您的计算机通过使用**文件夹选项**对话框中，可通过操作系统。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. **高级**按钮可显示是否与特定的已注册的文件类型关联的打开操作的对话框。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 此外，可以设置其他属性用于定义要与该文件执行的操作。In addition, you can set other properties that define actions to take with that file. 可以指定特定于类型的值属性属性。You can specify a value specific to the type of the property for the property. 例如，可以指定"打印"文档类型。For example, you can specify "print" for a document type. 此外，可以指定属性值是要传递到该文件的打开过程的命令行参数。Additionally, you can specify property values to be command-line arguments to pass to the file's open procedure. 例如，如果您指定在文本编辑器应用程序属性，可以使用属性来指定要通过在编辑器中打开的文本文件。For example, if you specify a text editor application in the property, you can use the property to specify a text file to be opened by the editor. 标准输入通常是键盘，而标准输出和标准错误通常是监视器屏幕。Standard input is usually the keyboard, and standard output and standard error are usually the monitor screen. 但是，可以使用， ，和属性使过程，以获取从输入或输出返回到一个文件或其他设备。However, you can use the , , and properties to cause the process to get input from or return output to a file or other device. 如果您使用， ，或上的属性组件，您必须首先设置相应的值上属性。If you use the , , or properties on the component, you must first set the corresponding value on the property. 否则，系统读取或写入到流时引发异常。Otherwise, the system throws an exception when you read or write to the stream. 设置属性可指定是否使用操作系统 shell 启动进程。Set the property to specify whether to start the process by using the operating system shell. 如果设置为`false`、 新进程将继承标准输入标准输出和标准错误流调用的处理，除非， ，或属性，分别设置为`true`.If is set to `false`, the new process inherits the standard input, standard output, and standard error streams of the calling process, unless the , , or properties, respectively, are set to `true`. 您可以更改的任何值进程启动时间的属性。You can change the value of any property up to the time that the process starts. 启动进程后，更改这些值将产生不起作用。After you start the process, changing these values has no effect. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类，启动 Internet Explorer 中，提供目标 Url 与参数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to start Internet Explorer, providing the destination URLs as arguments. [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，而不指定启动进程时使用的文件名。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying a file name with which to start the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置至少属性之前启动进程。You must set at least the property before you start the process. 任何应用程序或文档的文件的名称。The file name is any application or document. 在这种情况下，将文档定义已打开任何文件类型或默认与之关联的操作。In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 您可以查看已注册的文件类型和其关联的应用程序为您的计算机通过使用**文件夹选项**对话框中，可通过操作系统。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. **高级**按钮可显示是否与特定的已注册的文件类型关联的打开操作的对话框。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. （可选） 在开始该过程之前，还可以设置其他属性。Optionally, you can also set other properties before you start the process. 属性提供立即行动起来，如"打印"中指示的文件与属性。The property supplies actions to take, such as "print", with the file indicated in the property. 属性提供一种方式时系统将其打开，将命令行参数传递到该文件。The property supplies a way to pass command-line arguments to the file when the system opens it.

permission.span: 对于直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何应用程序或文档的文件的名称。The file name is any application or document. 在这种情况下，将文档定义已打开任何文件类型或默认与之关联的操作。In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 您可以查看已注册的文件类型和其关联的应用程序为您的计算机通过使用**文件夹选项**对话框中，可通过操作系统。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. **高级**按钮可显示是否与特定的已注册的文件类型关联的打开操作的对话框。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 您可以更改属性后调用此构造函数，最多的进程启动的时间。You can change the property after you call this constructor, up to the time that the process starts. 启动进程后，更改这些值将产生不起作用。After you start the process, changing these values has no effect.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifies an application file name with which to start the process, and specifies a set of command-line arguments to pass to the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何应用程序或文档的文件的名称。The file name is any application or document. 在这种情况下，将文档定义已打开任何文件类型或默认与之关联的操作。In this case, a document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 您可以查看已注册的文件类型和其关联的应用程序为您的计算机通过使用**文件夹选项**对话框中，可通过操作系统。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. **高级**按钮可显示是否与特定的已注册的文件类型关联的打开操作的对话框。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 您可以更改或属性后调用此构造函数，最多的进程启动的时间。You can change the or properties after you call this constructor, up to the time that the process starts. 启动进程后，更改这些值将产生不起作用。After you start the process, changing these values has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ArgumentList As Collection(Of String)

summary.span: 获取启动应用程序时要使用的命令行参数集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of command-line arguments to use when starting the application.

value.span: 命令行参数的集合。

span.span: A collection of command-line arguments.

remarks.format: 如果使用此属性来设置命令行参数，必须设置为空字符串。If you use this property to set command-line arguments, must be set to an empty string. ## Examples 此示例将两个参数添加到进程启动信息。This example adds two arguments to the process start info. ```csharp var info = new System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo("names.exe"); info.ArgumentList.Add("-first Mary"); info.ArgumentList.Add("-last Smith"); ``` ```vb Dim info As New System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo("names.exe") info.ArgumentList.Add("-first Mary") info.ArgumentList.Add("-last Smith") ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Arguments { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Arguments : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("Command line arguments that will be passed to the application specified by the FileName property.")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置启动应用程序时要使用的一组命令行自变量。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of command-line arguments to use when starting the application.

value.span: 单个字符串包含要传递给在 属性中指定的目标应用程序的参数。

span.span: A single string containing the arguments to pass to the target application specified in the property.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

value.span: 在 Windows Vista 和早期的 Windows 操作系统上，添加至进程全径的长度的参数长度必须小于 2080。

span.span: On Windows Vista and earlier versions of the Windows operating system, the length of the arguments added to the length of the full path to the process must be less than 2080.

value.span: 在 Windows 7 和更高版本，此长度必须小于 32699。

span.span: On Windows 7 and later versions, the length must be less than 32699.

value.span: 参数由目标应用程序进行分析和解释，因此必须与该应用程序的预期保持一致。

span.span: Arguments are parsed and interpreted by the target application, so must align with the expectations of that application.

value.span: 对于以下示例中所演示的 .NET 的应用程序，空格被解释为多个参数之间的分隔符。

span.span: For.NET applications as demonstrated in the Examples below, spaces are interpreted as a separator between multiple arguments.

value.span: 包含空格的单个参数必须用引号引起来，但这些引号不会传递到目标应用程序。

span.span: A single argument that includes spaces must be surrounded by quotation marks, but those quotation marks are not carried through to the target application.

value.span: 在包括引号在内的最终已分析的自变量中，每个标记均会进行三重转义。

span.span: In include quotation marks in the final parsed argument, triple-escape each mark.

remarks.format: 如果使用此属性来设置命令行参数不能包含任何元素。If you use this property to set command-line arguments, must not contain any elements. ## Examples 下面的第一个示例创建一个小型应用程序 (argsecho.exe) 该回显到控制台其自变量。The first example below creates a small application (argsecho.exe) that echos its arguments to the console. 第二个示例创建调用 argsecho.exe 演示参数属性的不同变体的应用程序。The second example creates an application that invokes argsecho.exe to demonstrate different variations for the Arguments property. [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[Process.Start_static#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CPP/processstartstatic.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_static#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/CS/processstartstatic.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_static#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_static/VB/processstartstatic.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否在新窗口中启动该进程的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to start the process in a new window.

value.span: 如果应启动该进程而不创建包含它的新窗口，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the process should be started without creating a new window to contain it; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性为 `true`，或者 和 属性不为 `null`，则将忽略 属性值并创建一个新窗口。If the property is `true` or the and properties are not `null`, the property value is ignored and a new window is created. .NET core 不支持直接在类似于 Unix 的平台，包括 macOS 和 Linux 上创建的 windows。.NET Core does not support creating windows directly on Unix-like platforms, including macOS and Linux. 在这种平台上，将忽略此属性。This property is ignored on such platforms. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/CPP/processstart.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/CS/processstart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/VB/processstart.vb#1)]

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ Environment { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取应用于此进程及其子进程的环境变量。

span.span: Gets the environment variables that apply to this process and its child processes.

value.span: 一个泛型字典，包含应用于此进程及其子进程的环境变量。

span.span: A generic dictionary containing the environment variables that apply to this process and its child processes.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 环境变量包含的文件搜索路径、 临时文件、 特定于应用程序的选项和其他类似的信息的目录。The environment variables contain search paths for files, directories for temporary files, application-specific options, and other similar information. 尽管您不能直接设置属性，可以修改该属性返回的泛型字典。Although you cannot directly set the property, you can modify the generic dictionary returned by the property. 例如，下面的代码添加 TempPath 环境变量： `myProcess.StartInfo.Environment.Add("TempPath", "C:\\Temp")`。For example, the following code adds a TempPath environment variable: `myProcess.StartInfo.Environment.Add("TempPath", "C:\\Temp")`. 必须设置属性设置为`false`以更改后启动过程属性。You must set the property to `false` to start the process after changing the property. 如果是`true`，则时引发调用方法。If is `true`, an is thrown when the method is called. 在.NET Framework 应用程序，使用属性是使用相同属性。On .NET Framework applications, using the property is the same as using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然不能设置，但属性，您可以修改属性返回。Although you cannot set the property, you can modify the returned by the property. 例如，下面的代码添加 TempPath 环境变量： `myProcess.StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables.Add("TempPath", "C:\\Temp")`。For example, the following code adds a TempPath environment variable: `myProcess.StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables.Add("TempPath", "C:\\Temp")`. 必须设置属性设置为`false`以更改后启动过程属性。You must set the property to `false` to start the process after changing the property. 如果是`true`，则时引发调用方法。If is `true`, an is thrown when the method is called.

summary.span: 获取或设置在为不能启动的进程显示错误对话框时要使用的窗口句柄。

span.span: Gets or sets the window handle to use when an error dialog box is shown for a process that cannot be started.

value.span: 一个指针，标识因进程启动失败而产生的错误对话框的句柄。

span.span: A pointer to the handle of the error dialog box that results from a process start failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，则属性指定显示的对话框中的父窗口。If is `true`, the property specifies the parent window for the dialog box that is shown. 它可用于指定要保留在应用程序前的对话框的父级。It is useful to specify a parent to keep the dialog box in front of the application.

summary.span: 获取或设置要启动的应用程序或文档。

span.span: Gets or sets the application or document to start.

value.span: 要启动的应用程序的名称或某文件类型的文档的名称，该文件类型与应用程序关联并且拥有可用的默认打开操作。

span.span: The name of the application to start, or the name of a document of a file type that is associated with an application and that has a default open action available to it.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置至少属性之前启动进程。You must set at least the property before you start the process. 任何应用程序或文档的文件的名称。The file name is any application or document. 将文档定义已打开任何文件类型或默认与之关联的操作。A document is defined to be any file type that has an open or default action associated with it. 您可以查看已注册的文件类型和其关联的应用程序为您的计算机通过使用**文件夹选项**对话框中，可通过操作系统。You can view registered file types and their associated applications for your computer by using the **Folder Options** dialog box, which is available through the operating system. **高级**按钮可显示是否与特定的已注册的文件类型关联的打开操作的对话框。The **Advanced** button leads to a dialog box that shows whether there is an open action associated with a specific registered file type. 可供你的文件类型套部分取决于值属性。The set of file types available to you depends in part on the value of the property. 如果是`true`，可以启动任何文档，并对文件执行操作，如打印与组件。If is `true`, you can start any document and perform operations on the file, such as printing, with the component. 当是`false`，可以启动的可执行文件与组件。When is `false`, you can start only executables with the component. 可以通过设置启动 ClickOnce 应用程序属性设置为最初从中安装应用程序的位置 （例如，Web 地址）。You can start a ClickOnce application by setting the property to the location (for example, a Web address) from which you originally installed the application. 通过在您的硬盘上指定其安装的位置不启动 ClickOnce 应用程序。Do not start a ClickOnce application by specifying its installed location on your hard disk. ## Examples [!code-cpp[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/CPP/processstart.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/CS/processstart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process.Start_instance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process.Start_instance/VB/processstart.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否从注册表加载 Windows 用户配置文件的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Windows user profile is to be loaded from the registry.

value.span: 如果应加载 Windows 用户概况，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Windows user profile should be loaded; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在使用的用户名、 密码和域启动的过程，将引用此属性。This property is referenced if the process is being started by using the user name, password, and domain. 如果值为`true`，用户的配置文件中`HKEY_USERS`加载注册表项。If the value is `true`, the user's profile in the `HKEY_USERS` registry key is loaded. 正在加载配置文件可能非常耗时。Loading the profile can be time-consuming. 因此，最好使用此值仅在必须访问中的信息`HKEY_CURRENT_USER`注册表项。Therefore, it is best to use this value only if you must access the information in the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` registry key. 在 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows 2000 中，配置文件是卸载后已终止新进程，而不考虑是否该进程已在创建子进程。In Windows Server 2003 and Windows 2000, the profile is unloaded after the new process has been terminated, regardless of whether the process has created child processes. 在 Windows XP 中，新过程完成后会卸载配置文件，它已创建的所有子进程已被都终止。In Windows XP, the profile is unloaded after the new process and all child processes it has created have been terminated.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个安全字符串，其中包含要在启动进程时使用的用户密码。

span.span: Gets or sets a secure string that contains the user password to use when starting the process.

value.span: 启动进程时使用的用户密码。

span.span: The user password to use when starting the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须设置属性，如果和提供。The property must be set if and are provided. 如果未设置默认工作目录为 %systemroot%\system32。If the property is not set, the default working directory is %SYSTEMROOT%\system32. > [!NOTE] > 设置， ，并中的属性对象是使用用户凭据启动的进程的建议的做法。Setting the , , and the properties in a object is the recommended practice for starting a process with user credentials. 一个对象就像对象，其文本值。A object is like a object in that it has a text value. 但是，值对象会自动加密，直到你的应用程序将其标记为只读的并且它可以从内存中删除计算机由你的应用程序或.NET Framework 垃圾回收器可以修改它。However, the value of a object is automatically encrypted, it can be modified until your application marks it as read-only, and it can be deleted from computer memory by either your application or the .NET Framework garbage collector. 有关安全字符串和如何获取用于设置此属性的密码的示例的详细信息，请参见 类。For more information about secure strings and an example of how to obtain a password to set this property, see the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果提供的值属性，属性必须`false`，或时将引发调用方法。If you provide a value for the property, the property must be `false`, or an will be thrown when the method is called.

span.span: Gets or sets the user password in clear text to use when starting the process.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示应用程序的输入是否从 流中读取的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the input for an application is read from the stream.

value.span: 如果应从 读取输入，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if input should be read from ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可以读取从其标准输入流，通常是键盘输入的文本。A can read input text from its standard input stream, typically the keyboard. 通过将重定向流，你可以以编程方式指定进程的输入。By redirecting the stream, you can programmatically specify the input of a process. 例如，而不是使用键盘输入，可以提供从指定文件的内容的文本或从另一个应用程序的输出。For example, instead of using keyboard input, you can provide text from the contents of a designated file or output from another application. > [!NOTE] > 必须设置到`false`如果你想要设置到`true`。You must set to `false` if you want to set to `true`. 否则，写入流将引发异常。Otherwise, writing to the stream throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重定向进程的流。The following example illustrates how to redirect the stream of a process. `sort`命令是一个控制台应用程序的读取，并对文本输入进行排序。The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 该示例启动`sort`命令和重定向的输入。The example starts the `sort` command with redirected input. 然后，它会提示用户输入文本，并将传递到文本`sort`进程的重定向通过流。It then prompts the user for text, and passes the text to the `sort` process through the redirected stream. `sort`结果显示到控制台上的用户。The `sort` results are displayed to the user on the console. [!code-cpp[Process_StandardInput#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardInput/CPP/process_standardinput.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_StandardInput#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardInput/CS/process_standardinput.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_StandardInput#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Process_StandardInput/VB/process_standardinput.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置错误输出的首选编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred encoding for error output.

value.span: 表示错误输出的首选编码的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the preferred encoding for error output.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值属性是`null`，过程将使用错误输出的默认标准错误编码。If the value of the property is `null`, the process uses the default standard error encoding for error output. 进程启动之前，必须设置属性。The property must be set before the process is started. 设置此属性不能保证该进程将使用指定的编码;该进程将使用它支持这些编码。Setting this property does not guarantee that the process will use the specified encoding; the process will use only those encodings that it supports. 应测试应用程序，以确定受支持的编码。The application should be tested to determine which encodings are supported.

span.span: An object that represents the preferred encoding for standard output.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的值属性是`null`，进程使用的标准输出的默认标准输出编码。If the value of the property is `null`, the process uses the default standard output encoding for the standard output. 进程启动之前，必须设置属性。The property must be set before the process is started. 设置此属性不能保证该进程将使用指定的编码。Setting this property does not guarantee that the process will use the specified encoding. 应测试应用程序，以确定该过程支持的编码。The application should be tested to determine which encodings the process supports.

value.span: 启动进程时使用的用户名。

span.span: The user name to use when starting the process.

value.span: 如果使用 UPN 格式，@，则 属性必须为 。

span.span: If you use the UPN format, @, the property must be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须设置属性，如果和提供。The property must be set if and are provided. 如果未设置默认工作目录为 %systemroot%\system32。If the property is not set, the default working directory is %SYSTEMROOT%\system32. 如果属性不是`null`或空字符串，属性必须是`false`，或时将引发调用方法。If the property is not `null` or an empty string, the property must be `false`, or an will be thrown when the method is called.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("Whether to use the operating system shell to start the process.")
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否使用操作系统 shell 启动进程的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the operating system shell to start the process.

value.span: 如果应在启动进程时使用 shell，则为 ；如果直接从可执行文件创建进程，则为 。

span.span: if the shell should be used when starting the process; if the process should be created directly from the executable file.

value.span: 默认值是上的.NET Framework 应用和上.NET Core 应用。

span.span: The default is on .NET Framework apps and on .NET Core apps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`false`，可将输入、 输出和错误流重定向。Setting this property to `false` enables you to redirect input, output, and error streams. Word 在此上下文中的"shell"(`UseShellExecute`) 指的是图形外壳程序 （类似于 Windows 外壳程序） 而不是命令 shell (例如，`bash`或`sh`)，并允许用户启动的图形应用程序或打开的文档。The word "shell" in this context (`UseShellExecute`) refers to a graphical shell (similar to the Windows shell) rather than command shells (for example, `bash` or `sh`) and lets users launch graphical applications or open documents. > [!NOTE] > 必须是`false`如果属性不是`null`或空字符串，或时将引发调用方法。 must be `false` if the property is not `null` or an empty string, or an will be thrown when the method is called. 在使用操作系统 shell 启动进程时，可以使用 对象启动任何文档（可以是与具有默认打开操作的可执行文件关联的任何注册文件）并对该文件执行操作（如打印）。When you use the operating system shell to start processes, you can start any document (which is any registered file type associated with an executable that has a default open action) and perform operations on the file, such as printing, by using the object. 当 为 `false` 时，仅可使用 对象启动可执行文件。When is `false`, you can start only executables by using the object. > [!NOTE] > 必须是`true`如果您设置属性设置为`true`。 must be `true` if you set the property to `true`. 如果您设置到，必须设置为`true`。If you set the to , must be set to `true`. ### WorkingDirectoryWorkingDirectory 属性的行为随 属性的值而异。The property behaves differently depending on the value of the property. 当是`true`，则属性指定的可执行文件的位置。When is `true`, the property specifies the location of the executable. 如果 是一个空字符串，则假定当前目录包含可执行文件。If is an empty string, it is assumed that the current directory contains the executable. 当是`false`，则属性不用于查找可执行文件。When is `false`, the property is not used to find the executable. 相反，它只能由已启动的进程使用，并且仅在新进程的上下文中有意义。Instead, it is used only by the process that is started and has meaning only within the context of the new process. 当是`false`，则属性可以是可执行文件的完全限定的路径或简单的可执行文件名称，系统将尝试在 PATH 环境变量所指定的文件夹中查找。When is `false`, the property can be either a fully qualified path to the executable, or a simple executable name that the system will attempt to find within folders specified by the PATH environment variable. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ProcessOneStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessOneStream/CPP/stdstr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProcessOneStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessOneStream/CS/stdstr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProcessOneStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessOneStream/VB/stdstr.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用上将值设置为 。

span.span: An attempt to set the value to on Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps occurs.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The verb to apply to the document specified by the FileName property.")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置打开 属性指定的应用程序或文档时要使用的谓词。

span.span: Gets or sets the verb to use when opening the application or document specified by the property.

value.span: 要对进程打开的文件执行的操作。

span.span: The action to take with the file that the process opens.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，它表示没有操作。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which signifies no action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个文件扩展名有其自己的谓词，可以通过使用获取集属性。Each file name extension has its own set of verbs, which can be obtained by using the property. 例如，"`print`"谓词将打印文档通过使用指定。For example, the "`print`" verb will print a document specified by using . 可以通过使用空字符串指定默认的谓词 ("")。The default verb can be specified by using an empty string (""). 谓词的示例包括"编辑"、"打开"、"OpenAsReadOnly"、"打印"和"Printto"。Examples of verbs are "Edit", "Open", "OpenAsReadOnly", "Print", and "Printto". 应使用返回的谓词集中出现的谓词属性。You should use only verbs that appear in the set of verbs returned by the property. 当你使用属性，您必须包括文件扩展名设置的值时属性。When you use the property, you must include the file name extension when you set the value of the property. 文件名称不需要提供一个扩展，如果手动输入一个值属性。The file name does not need to have an extension if you manually enter a value for the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过使用指定的谓词和文件名称启动一个新进程。The following code example starts a new process by using the specified verb and file name. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分属性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. [!code-csharp[ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbs As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Verbs { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与 属性指定的文件类型关联的一组谓词。

span.span: Gets the set of verbs associated with the type of file specified by the property.

value.span: 系统可应用于 属性所指示文件的操作。

span.span: The actions that the system can apply to the file indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够确定可用于指定的文件的谓词属性。The property enables you to determine the verbs that can be used with the file specified by the property. 可以设置属性设置为任何谓词集中的值。You can set the property to the value of any verb in the set. 谓词的示例包括"编辑"、"打开"、"OpenAsReadOnly"、"打印"和"Printto"。Examples of verbs are "Edit", "Open", "OpenAsReadOnly", "Print", and "Printto". 当你使用属性，您必须包括文件扩展名设置的值时属性。When you use the property, you must include the file name extension when you set the value of the property. 文件扩展名确定可能的谓词组。The file name extension determines the set of possible verbs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示所选的文件名称定义的谓词。The following code example displays the defined verbs for the chosen file name. 如果用户选择一个定义的谓词，该示例将启动一个新的进程，使用所选的谓词和输入的文件的名称。If the user selects one of the defined verbs, the example starts a new process using the selected verb and the input file name. [!code-csharp[ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ProcessVerbs_Diagnostics/VB/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置启动进程时使用的窗口状态。

span.span: Gets or sets the window state to use when the process is started.

value.span: 枚举值之一，它指示是在最大化窗口、最小化窗口、正常(即非最大化也非最小化)窗口还是在不可见的窗口中启动进程。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the process is started in a window that is maximized, minimized, normal (neither maximized nor minimized), or not visible.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 当 属性为 时，将获取或设置要启动的进程的工作目录。

span.span: When the property is , gets or sets the working directory for the process to be started.

summary.span: 当 为 时，获取或设置包含要启动的进程的目录。

span.span: When is , gets or sets the directory that contains the process to be started.

value.span: 当 为 时，是包含要启动的进程的目录的完全限定名。

span.span: When is , the fully qualified name of the directory that contains the process to be started.

value.span: 当 属性为 时，则为要启动的进程的工作目录。

span.span: When the property is , the working directory for the process to be started.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须设置属性，如果和提供。The property must be set if and are provided. 如果未设置默认工作目录为 %systemroot%\system32。If the property is not set, the default working directory is %SYSTEMROOT%\system32. 如果目录已系统 path 变量的一部分，您无需重复此属性中的目录的位置。If the directory is already part of the system path variable, you do not have to repeat the directory's location in this property. 属性的行为以不同的方式时是`true`比是`false`。The property behaves differently when is `true` than when is `false`. 当是`true`，则属性指定的可执行文件的位置。When is `true`, the property specifies the location of the executable. 如果是空字符串，则认为当前目录以包含可执行文件。If is an empty string, the current directory is understood to contain the executable. > [!NOTE] > 当 是 `true` 时，启动可执行文件的应用程序的工作目录也是该可执行文件的工作目录。When is `true`, the working directory of the application that starts the executable is also the working directory of the executable. 当是`false`，则属性不用于查找可执行文件。When is `false`, the property is not used to find the executable. 相反，其值应用于已启动的进程，并且仅在新进程的上下文中有意义。Instead, its value applies to the process that is started and only has meaning within the context of the new process.
